mapper.select: SELECT ns.nursing_service_id, ns.customer_id, np.NAME, ns.amount, CASE WHEN ns.amount >= 0 THEN '数量正常' ELSE '欠费' END AS state, CASE WHEN ns.end_time < CURRENT_TIMESTAMP THEN '到期' ELSE '未到期' END AS time_status FROM t_nursing_service ns JOIN t_nursing_project np ON ns.nursing_project_id = np.nursing_project_id WHERE ns.customer_id = #{customerId} and ns.state=1

SELECT ns.nursing_service_id, ns.customer_id, np.NAME, ns.amount, CASE WHEN ns.amount >= 0 THEN '数量正常' ELSE '欠费' END AS state, CASE WHEN ns.end_time < CURRENT_TIMESTAMP THEN '到期' ELSE '未到期' END AS time_status FROM t_nursing_service ns JOIN t_nursing_project np ON ns.nursing_project_id = np.nursing_project_id WHERE customer_id=#{customerId} and np.name like concat('%',#{name},'%') and ns.state=1
